Info.Description:
Timescale Increase
Decreases the rate of passage of time in-game.
Changes made by this mod: [list] [*] Days and nights are now roughly 3 times longer. [/list]
Other Information: [list] [*] This mod is co-op friendly. However, the host's timescale settings apply in coop play. If you are joining another player's game, their settings will apply. [/list]
Credits: [list] [*] [size=1][color=lightgreen]Author: [/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/32262030][b]LinkHero95[/b][/url][/size] [/list]
